data.text: But why have the seasons been hidden from the Lord,
While the ungodly have passed over the bound,
They have led away the ass of the fatherless,
They have turned aside the weak from the right way:
And they have departed like asses in the field,
They have reaped a field that was not their own before the time:
They have caused many naked to sleep without clothes,
They are wet with the drops of the mountains:
They have snatched the fatherless from the breast,
And they have wrongfully caused others to sleep without clothing,
They have unrighteously laid wait in narrow places,
Who have cast forth the poor from the city and their own houses,
Why then has he not visited these?
But having known their works, he delivered them into darkness:
And the eye of the adulterer has watched for the darkness,
In darkness he digs through houses:
For the morning is to them all as the shadow of death,
He is swift on the face of the water:
Let them be withered upon the earth;
Then is his sin brought to remembrance,
For he has not treated the barren woman well,
And in wrath he has overthrown the helpless:
When he has fallen sick, let him not hope to recover: but let him perish by disease.
For his exaltation has hurt many;
But if not, who is he that says I speak falsely,
